sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Maneuver) The character may take the Force Protection maneuver, suffering 1 strain and committing a number of force dice (white d12) no greater than Force rating or ranks of Force Protection. The character then increases his soak value by an equal amount. The character suffers 1 strain at the beginning of each of his turns in which he keeps these dice committed.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Force protection</name> <number>TAL0001048</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 23:08:26</sys_created_on> <sys_id>753fdba0db2e0c542901de90cf9619e5</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 23:08:26</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
